comments.body: So you decided to ruin your accountlike that Â Selling Bitcointalk accounts is heavily frowned upon by the community members, and it will attract negative tags on your profiles very soon. Once you sell an account, nobody knows if the new own of the account can be trusted or what their intentions may be (they are mostly malicious) thus the precautionary negative feedback from DT members.You have been in this forum long enough, you should be knowing this.Archive: https://ninjastic.space/post/61288147
